titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C16

body.ab: <lb n="c56-0119__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0119.01" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 14<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0119__main__2"/>The next day, contrary to the prognostics of our <lb n="c56-0119__main__3"/> guides, was fine although clouded. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>We visited the <lb n="c56-0119__main__4"/> source of the Aveiron and rode about the <lb n="c56-0119__main__5"/> valley <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0119__main__d2e25060"/>the whole da<del eID="c56-0119__main__d2e25060"/><mdel>y</mdel>until evening. These sublime and <lb n="c56-0119__main__6"/> magnificent scenes afforded me the greatest <lb n="c56-0119__main__7"/> consolation that I was capable of receiving <lb n="c56-0119__main__8"/> They elevated me from all littleness of feeling <lb n="c56-0119__main__9"/> and although they <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0119__main__d2e25082"/>d<del eID="c56-0119__main__d2e25082"/> did not remove my <lb n="c56-0119__main__10"/> grief they <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0119__main__d2e25088"/>t<del eID="c56-0119__main__d2e25088"/> subdued and tranquilized it. <lb n="c56-0119__main__11"/> In some degree, also they diverted my mind <lb n="c56-0119__main__12"/> from the thoughts <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>over which it had brooded <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0119__main__d2e25111"/>over<del eID="c56-0119__main__d2e25111"/><lb n="c56-0119__main__13"/> for the last month<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0119__main__d2e25116"/>s<del eID="c56-0119__main__d2e25116"/>. I returned in the <lb n="c56-0119__main__14"/> evening, fatigued but less unhappy and convered <lb n="c56-0119__main__15"/> with the family <del sID="c56-0119__main__d2e25123" type="strikethrough"/>t<del eID="c56-0119__main__d2e25123"/> with more cheerfulness than <lb n="c56-0119__main__16"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0119__main__d2e25129"/>I<del eID="c56-0119__main__d2e25129"/> had been <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0119__main__d2e25134"/>accustomed<del eID="c56-0119__main__d2e25134"/><mdel>to</mdel>my custom for some time. My fa<lb n="c56-0119__main__17"/>ther was pleased and Elizabeth overjoyed; "My <lb n="c56-0119__main__18"/> dear Cousin," said she, "You see what happiness <lb n="c56-0119__main__19"/> you diffuse when you are <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0119__main__d2e25157"/>cheerful<del eID="c56-0119__main__d2e25157"/>happy; do <lb n="c56-0119__main__20"/> not relapse again!â€”<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0119__main__21"/> The following morning the rain poured <lb n="c56-0119__main__22"/> down in torrents and thick mists hid <lb n="c56-0119__main__23"/> the summits of the mountains. I rose early <lb n="c56-0119__main__24"/> but felt unusually melancholy. The rain <lb n="c56-0119__main__25"/> depressed <mdel>my</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me, my old feelings recurred <lb n="c56-0119__main__26"/> and I was miserable. I knew how my father <lb n="c56-0119__main__27"/> would be dissapointed at this sudden <lb n="c56-0119__main__28"/> change and I wished to avoid him <lb n="c56-0119__main__29"/> untill I had <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0119__main__d2e25203"/>rev<del eID="c56-0119__main__d2e25203"/> recovered myself so far <lb n="c56-0119__main__30"/> as to conceal the feelings that overpowered <lb n="c56-0119__main__31"/> me â€” I knew that they would remain <lb n="c56-0119__main__32"/> that day at the inn and as I had<lb n="c56-0120__main__1"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25223"/>n<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25223"/>ever inured myself to rain and cold I <lb n="c56-0120__main__2"/> resolved <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25228"/>t<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25228"/> to go to the summit of <lb n="c56-0120__main__3"/> Montanvert <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25236"/>by myself<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25236"/>alone. I remembered <lb n="c56-0120__main__4"/> the effect the view of the tremendous <lb n="c56-0120__main__5"/> and ever moving glacier had <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25249"/>had<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25249"/><lb n="c56-0120__left_margin__1"/>produced<lb n="c56-0120__main__6"/> upon my mind when I first saw it <lb n="c56-0120__main__7"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25270"/>how<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25270"/><mdel>i</mdel>It had then filled me with <lb n="c56-0120__main__8"/> a sublime extacy that gave wings <lb n="c56-0120__main__9"/> to the soul and allowed <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>it to soar from <lb n="c56-0120__main__10"/> the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25303"/>lower<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25303"/>obscure world to light & joy. The <lb n="c56-0120__main__11"/> sight of the awful & majestic in <lb n="c56-0120__main__12"/> nature had indeed always the effect <lb n="c56-0120__main__13"/> of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25319"/>tranquillizing the<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25319"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>solemnizing<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>my mind & causing <lb n="c56-0120__main__14"/> me to forget the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25343"/>the<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25343"/> passing cares <lb n="c56-0120__main__15"/> of life. I determined to go <mdel>f</mdel><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25354"/>by myself<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25354"/>alone<lb n="c56-0120__main__16"/> for I was well acquainted with the <lb n="c56-0120__main__17"/> path and the presence of another <lb n="c56-0120__main__18"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25369"/>had the effect of<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25369"/>would destroy<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25377"/>ing<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25377"/> the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25380"/>solitary<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25380"/><lb n="c56-0120__main__19"/> solitary grandeur of the scene.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0120__main__20"/> The ascent <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25394"/>to the mountain<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25394"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ispre<lb n="c56-0120__main__21"/>cipitous<mdel>w</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25424"/>with<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25424"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>but the path is cut into continual and short <lb n="c56-0120__main__22"/> windings which enable<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25443"/>s<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25443"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0120__main__d2e25446"/>to<del eID="c56-0120__main__d2e25446"/> you <lb n="c56-0120__main__23"/> surmount the perpedicularity of <lb n="c56-0120__main__24"/> the mountainsâ€“ It is a scene terrifical <lb n="c56-0120__main__25"/> ly desolate. In a thousand places the <lb n="c56-0120__main__26"/> traces of the winter avelanche may <lb n="c56-0120__main__27"/> be perceived where trees lie broken <lb n="c56-0120__main__28"/> and strewed on the ground; some <lb n="c56-0120__main__29"/> entirely destroyed others bent leaning<lb n="c56-0121__main__1"/> upon <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0121__main__d2e25478"/>juts in<del eID="c56-0121__main__d2e25478"/> the jutting <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0121__main__d2e25483"/>corners<del eID="c56-0121__main__d2e25483"/>rocks of the <lb n="c56-0121__main__2"/> mountain, or <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>transversely upon other trees. The <lb n="c56-0121__main__3"/> path as you <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0121__main__d2e25507"/>ascen<del eID="c56-0121__main__d2e25507"/> ascend higher is inters<lb n="c56-0121__main__4"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0121__main__d2e25516"/>persed<del eID="c56-0121__main__d2e25516"/>ected<mdel>wi</mdel><mdel>th</mdel>by ravines of snow, down which <lb n="c56-0121__main__5"/> stones continually roll from above; <lb n="c56-0121__main__6"/> one of the them is particularly dange<lb n="c56-0121__main__7"/>rous as the slightest sound such as even<lb n="c56-0121__main__8"/> speaking in a loud voice <mdel>is</mdel>produces a suffi<lb n="c56-0121__main__9"/> cien<mdel>d</mdel>t concussion of air sufficient <lb n="c56-0121__main__10"/> to draw destruction the head of the <lb n="c56-0121__main__11"/> speaker. The pines here are not <lb n="c56-0121__main__12"/> tall or luxuriant but they are sombre <lb n="c56-0121__main__13"/> and add an air of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0121__main__d2e25597"/>gravit<del eID="c56-0121__main__d2e25597"/><mdel>y</mdel>severity to the scene. <lb n="c56-0121__main__14"/> I looked on the valley beneath.; Vast mist <lb n="c56-0121__main__15"/> were rising from the river which ran <lb n="c56-0121__main__16"/> through<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0121__main__d2e25616"/>t<del eID="c56-0121__main__d2e25616"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>it and curling in thick wreaths <lb n="c56-0121__main__17"/> around the opposite mountains <lb n="c56-0121__main__18"/> whose summits were hid in the <lb n="c56-0121__main__19"/><lb n="c56-0121__left_margin__1"/>uniform clouds, while rain poured from the <lb n="c56-0121__main__20"/> dark sky and added to the melancholy <lb n="c56-0121__main__21"/> impression I received from the objects <lb n="c56-0121__main__22"/> around me â€” Alas! <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0121__main__d2e25655"/>who can boast<del eID="c56-0121__main__d2e25655"/> why <lb n="c56-0121__main__23"/> does man boast of sensibilities above <lb n="c56-0121__main__24"/> those apparent in the brute it only <lb n="c56-0121__main__25"/> renders them more <shi rend="underline">necessary</shi> beings. Hunger <lb n="c56-0121__main__26"/>& desire and If our impulses were <lb n="c56-0121__main__27"/> confined to hunger thirst and desire <lb n="c56-0121__main__28"/> we might be <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0121__main__d2e25683"/>more<del eID="c56-0121__main__d2e25683"/>nearly free but now <lb n="c56-0121__main__29"/> we are moved by every wind that <lb n="c56-0121__main__30"/> blows & by every <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0121__main__d2e25694"/>sc<del eID="c56-0121__main__d2e25694"/> chance <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0121__main__d2e25698"/>work<del eID="c56-0121__main__d2e25698"/> word or<lb n="c56-0122__main__1"/> scene that that wind may convey to <lb n="c56-0122__main__2"/> us<milestone spanTo="#c56-0122.01" unit="tei:lg"/><lb n="c56-0122__main__3"/> We rest, A dream has power to poison <lb n="c56-0122__main__4"/><metamark>L</metamark> sleep <lb n="c56-0122__main__5"/> We rise one wandering thought pollutes <lb n="c56-0122__main__6"/> the day <lb n="c56-0122__main__7"/> We feel conceive, or reason â€“ laugh or weep <lb n="c56-0122__main__8"/> Embrace fond woe or cast our cares <lb n="c56-0122__main__9"/> away<milestone spanTo="#c56-0122.02" unit="tei:lg"/><lb n="c56-0122__main__10"/> It is the same â€“for be it joy or sorrow <lb n="c56-0122__main__11"/> The path of its departure still is free <lb n="c56-0122__main__12"/> Mans yesterday may ne'er be like <lb n="c56-0122__main__13"/>his morrow <lb n="c56-0122__main__14"/> Nought may endure but mutability.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0122__main__15"/> It was noon when I arrived at the <lb n="c56-0122__main__16"/> top of the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0122__main__d2e25769"/>mountain<del eID="c56-0122__main__d2e25769"/>ascent. For some time I <lb n="c56-0122__main__17"/> sat upon the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0122__main__d2e25778"/>the<del eID="c56-0122__main__d2e25778"/> rock that overlooks <lb n="c56-0122__main__18"/> the sea of ice. A mist covered both <lb n="c56-0122__main__19"/> that and the surrounding untains <lb n="c56-0122__main__20"/> Presently a breeze dissipated the mist <lb n="c56-0122__main__21"/> and I descended on the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0122__main__d2e25801"/>ice<del eID="c56-0122__main__d2e25801"/>glacier. It is in<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0122__main__d2e25813"/>s<del eID="c56-0122__main__d2e25813"/>tersper<lb n="c56-0122__main__22"/>sed with rifts â€“ The surface is very uneven <lb n="c56-0122__main__23"/> rising like the waves of a troubled sea, <lb n="c56-0122__main__24"/> decending <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0122__main__d2e25827"/>tow<del eID="c56-0122__main__d2e25827"/> low, & in<mdel>s</mdel>terspered by rifts <lb n="c56-0122__main__25"/> that sink deepâ€” The <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0122__main__d2e25843"/>width of the<del eID="c56-0122__main__d2e25843"/>field of<lb n="c56-0122__main__26"/> ice is <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0122__main__d2e25853"/>nearly<del eID="c56-0122__main__d2e25853"/> a <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0122__main__d2e25856"/>lege<del eID="c56-0122__main__d2e25856"/> league,<metamark>^</metamark>in width, but I was <lb n="c56-0122__main__27"/> nearly two hours in crossing it â€“ Theoppo<lb n="c56-0122__main__28"/>site<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0122__main__d2e25883"/>t<del eID="c56-0122__main__d2e25883"/> mountain is a bare perpendicu<lb n="c56-0122__main__29"/>lar rock.â€“From that side where I now <lb n="c56-0122__main__30"/> stood Montanvert was exactly opposite <lb n="c56-0122__main__31"/> at the distance of a league and above<lb n="c56-0123__main__1"/> I should listen to the dÃ¦mon â€“ my <lb n="c56-0123__main__2"/> feelings were ag<shi rend="underline">ainst</shi> it but the <lb n="c56-0123__main__3"/> misery he expressed had al<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0123__main__d2e25917"/>l<del eID="c56-0123__main__d2e25917"/>ready <lb n="c56-0123__main__4"/> moved my compassion and I thought <lb n="c56-0123__main__5"/> the least justice I could shew would <lb n="c56-0123__main__6"/> be to listen to to his tale.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0123__main__7"/> We entered the hut â€“ the monster <lb n="c56-0123__main__8"/> lighted a fire and sitting by it he <lb n="c56-0123__main__9"/> began thus.<lb n="c56-0123__main__10"/> it rose Mont Blanc in awful majesty. I re<lb n="c56-0123__main__11"/>mained in a recess of the rock gazing on <lb n="c56-0123__main__12"/> this wonderful & stupedous scene â€“ <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__1"/> the sea or <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__2"/> rather the vast river of <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__3"/> ice, wound among <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__4"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0123__left_margin__d2e25969"/>the<del eID="c56-0123__left_margin__d2e25969"/> its dependant <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__5"/> mountains whose <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__6"/> aerial summits <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__7"/> hung over its <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__8"/> recesses. Thier <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__9"/> icy & glittering <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__10"/> peaks shone <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__11"/> in sunlight <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__12"/> over the clouds. My heart <lb n="c56-0123__main__13"/> before<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0123__main__d2e26006"/>sad<del eID="c56-0123__main__d2e26006"/>which was sorrowful<mdel>ly</mdel>, now swelled with somthing like <lb n="c56-0123__main__14"/> joy <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0123__main__d2e26018"/>I clas<del eID="c56-0123__main__d2e26018"/> I exclaimed â€“ Wandering spirits, <lb n="c56-0123__main__15"/> if indeed ye wander and do not rest in <lb n="c56-0123__main__16"/> your narrow beds, allow me this faint <lb n="c56-0123__main__17"/> happiness or take me as your compa<lb n="c56-0123__main__18"/>nion away from the joys of life." As I <lb n="c56-0123__main__19"/> said this I suddenly beheld <mdel>a</mdel><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0123__main__d2e26041"/>human<del eID="c56-0123__main__d2e26041"/>the<lb n="c56-0123__main__20"/> figure of a man at some distance advancing <lb n="c56-0123__main__21"/> towards me with superhuman speedâ€” <lb n="c56-0123__main__22"/> He bounded over the crevices in the <lb n="c56-0123__main__23"/> ice <mdel>by</mdel>among which I had walked with caution, <lb n="c56-0123__main__24"/> his stature also as he approached seem <lb n="c56-0123__main__25"/> ed to exceed that of man â€“I was <lb n="c56-0123__main__26"/> troubled â€” a mist covered my eyes and <lb n="c56-0123__main__27"/> I felt <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0123__main__d2e26080"/>ready to pa faint<del eID="c56-0123__main__d2e26080"/>faintness seize me. â€“ The cold breeze <lb n="c56-0123__main__28"/> of the mountains quickly restored me. <lb n="c56-0123__main__29"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0123__main__d2e26092"/>But<del eID="c56-0123__main__d2e26092"/> I perceived as <mdel>he</mdel>the shape came nearer<lb n="c56-0124__main__1"/> (<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26114"/>oh<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26114"/> sight tremendous and abhorred) that it <lb n="c56-0124__main__2"/> was the wretch whom I had <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26119"/>cr<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26119"/> created and <lb n="c56-0124__main__3"/> who had caused me such deep misery. I <lb n="c56-0124__main__4"/> trembled with rage <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26131"/>an<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26131"/> and horror <del next="#c56-0124.03" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26134"/>determin<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26134"/>I<lb n="c56-0124__main__5"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26143" xml:id="c56-0124.03"/>ing<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26143"/>resolv<mdel>in</mdel>ed<del rend="unmarked" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26157"/>g<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26157"/> to wait his approach& then close <lb n="c56-0124__main__6"/> with him in mortal combat. He ap<lb n="c56-0124__main__7"/>proached; I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26172"/>saw again that form from which<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26172"/><lb n="c56-0124__main__8"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26177"/>I<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26177"/> His countenance bespoke bitter anguish <lb n="c56-0124__main__9"/> combined with d<mdel>e</mdel>isdain and malignancy. <lb n="c56-0124__main__10"/> But I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26199"/>hardly<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26199"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>scarcely observed thisâ€“anger and hatred <lb n="c56-0124__main__11"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26214"/>at f<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26214"/> had at first deprived me of utterance <lb n="c56-0124__main__12"/> and I recovered only to overwhelm him <lb n="c56-0124__main__13"/> with <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26222"/>express<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26222"/> words expressive of utter <lb n="c56-0124__main__14"/> detestation <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26227"/>and<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26227"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26230"/>re<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26230"/> and contempt â€“ "Devil" <lb n="c56-0124__main__15"/> I exclaimed â€“ "do you dare approach me <lb n="c56-0124__main__16"/> and do not <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>you dread the fierce vengeance <lb n="c56-0124__main__17"/> of my arm wreaked on your miserable <lb n="c56-0124__main__18"/> head â€“ Begone vile insect or <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>rather Stay that <lb n="c56-0124__main__19"/> I may trample you to dust and oh that <lb n="c56-0124__main__20"/> I could with <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26284"/>end<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26284"/>extinction of your miserable existence <lb n="c56-0124__main__21"/> restore those creatures whom you <lb n="c56-0124__main__22"/> have diabollicaly murdered"<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0124__main__23"/> "I expected this reception" said the dÃ¦mon <lb n="c56-0124__main__24"/> all men hate <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the wretched â€“ how then <lb n="c56-0124__main__25"/> must <mdel>O</mdel>I be hated who am miserable <lb n="c56-0124__main__26"/> beyond <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26334"/>conception or<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26334"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26337"/>idea<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26337"/>all living things. â€“ Yet you <lb n="c56-0124__main__27"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0124__main__d2e26346"/>my<del eID="c56-0124__main__d2e26346"/> my creator hate me and spurn me<lb n="c56-0125__main__1"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0125__main__d2e26359"/>me<del eID="c56-0125__main__d2e26359"/> thy to his taleâ€”I was partly urged <lb n="c56-0129__main__15"/> by curiosity, and compassion confirmed <lb n="c56-0129__main__16"/> me.â€“ <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0129__main__d2e27662"/>As<del eID="c56-0129__main__d2e27662"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0129__main__d2e27665"/>I was not<del eID="c56-0129__main__d2e27665"/> I had hitherto suppos<lb n="c56-0129__main__17"/>ed him to be the murderer of my brother <lb n="c56-0129__main__18"/> and I wished to find this either confirmed <lb n="c56-0129__main__19"/> or denied<del rend="unmarked" sID="c56-0129__main__d2e27686"/>.<del eID="c56-0129__main__d2e27686"/><lb n="c56-0129__left_margin__1"/> I eagerly sought <lb n="c56-0129__left_margin__2"/> a confirma<lb n="c56-0129__left_margin__3"/>tion or denial <lb n="c56-0129__left_margin__4"/> of this opinion. For the first time also I felt <lb n="c56-0129__main__20"/> what the duties of a creator towards his <lb n="c56-0129__main__21"/> creature were and that I ought to <lb n="c56-0129__main__22"/> render him happy before I complained <lb n="c56-0129__main__23"/> of his wickedness. these motives urged me <lb n="c56-0129__main__24"/> to comply with his <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0129__main__d2e27727"/>request<del eID="c56-0129__main__d2e27727"/>demand â€“ We crossed <lb n="c56-0129__main__25"/> the ice therefore, and ascended the <lb n="c56-0129__main__26"/> opposite rock.â€“ The air was cold and <lb n="c56-0129__main__27"/> the rain began again to descendâ€“We <lb n="c56-0129__main__28"/> entered the hut â€“ the fiend with an <lb n="c56-0129__main__29"/> air of exultation I with a heavy<lb n="c56-0130__main__1"/> heart and depressed spirits â€“ But I consented <lb n="c56-0130__main__2"/> to listen and <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0130__main__d2e27759"/>sitting<del eID="c56-0130__main__d2e27759"/>seating myself by the fire which he <lb n="c56-0130__main__3"/> lighted he thus <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0130__main__d2e27768"/>began<del eID="c56-0130__main__d2e27768"/> began his tale.
